mapper.insert: INSERT INTO application_feature ( id, application_id, parent_id, code, name, display_name, type, url, target, icon_path, big_icon_path, help_url, hidden, effect_scope, tree_view_scope, locking, order_id, status, remark, modified_date, created_date ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{applicationId}, #{parentId}, #{code}, #{name}, #{displayName}, #{type}, #{url}, #{target}, #{iconPath}, #{bigIconPath}, #{helpUrl}, #{hidden}, #{effectScope}, #{treeViewScope}, #{locking}, #{orderId}, #{status}, #{remark}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )
mapper.update: UPDATE application_feature SET application_id = #{applicationId}, parent_id = #{parentId}, code = #{code}, name = #{name}, display_name = #{displayName}, type = #{type}, url = #{url}, target = #{target}, icon_path = #{iconPath}, big_icon_path = #{bigIconPath}, help_url = #{helpUrl}, hidden = #{hidden}, effect_scope = #{effectScope}, tree_view_scope = #{treeViewScope}, locking = #{locking}, order_id = #{orderId}, status = #{status}, remark = #{remark}, modified_date =CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM application_feature WHERE id IN ( SELECT entity_id FROM application_scope WHERE authorization_object_id = #{accountId})

SELECT * FROM application_feature WHERE application_id = #{application_id} AND parent_id = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000' AND type IN ('function', 'action') AND status = 1 ORDER BY order_id, code
SELECT * FROM application_feature WHERE parent_id = #{parent_id} AND type IN ('function', 'action') AND status = 1 ORDER BY order_id, code
SELECT * FROM application_feature WHERE parent_id = #{parent_id} AND type = #{type} AND status = 1 ORDER BY order_id, code
SELECT COUNT(*) AS "Count" FROM application_feature T WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT COUNT(*) AS "Count" FROM application_feature T WHERE name = #{name}
select a.* from application_scope appc , sys_account a where appc.authorization_object_id = a.id and appc.authorization_object_type=#{applicationMembersType} and entity_id=#{applicationId}
